description:
If you're a huge Philadelphia fan, this is the app for you!  Philadelphia Football Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team! 

You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Philadelphia fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Philadelphia. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Philadelphia Football Fans today! 


** Brighthouse Labs, and the Philadelphia Football Fans application are in no way associated with the NFL or the Philadelphia Eagles. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
